Package ohos.utils.system

Class SystemCapability

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.utils.system.SystemCapability

  • public final class SystemCapability
extends Object
    Defines the hardware capabilities and software capabilities used in the system.

    The standard capability name is in the format of SystemCapability.xxx.xxx, SystemCapability.xxx.xxx.xxx for example, SystemCapability.PowerMgr.BatteryManager for SystemCapability.PowerMgr.BATTERY_MANAGER and SystemCapability.Data.Preferences for SystemCapability.Data.PREFERENCES.

    Since:
    5
